text: Xindao de renmen a! Nimen dang fucong zhenzhu, yingdang fucong shizhe he nimen zhong de zhushi ren, ruguo nimen wei yi jian shi er zhengzhi, nimen shi na jian shi guizhenzhu he shizhe (panjue), ruguo nimen quexin zhenzhu he mori dehua. Zhe duiyu nimen shi biyi geng duo de, shi jieguo geng meide.
